content:
In this project, The objective is to build a script that can identify a mushroom and tell us if it is edible, unedible or poisonous.
First data needs to be gathered. To do so the website http://www.mushroom.world will be used as it contains an extensive database of mushrooms and their characteristics. As the database is not downloadable it will need to be wrangled.
description: Building a scripts that recognize mushrooms
title: Mushcognition
